thread.title: Heidi Klum's Halloween costume is going to be epic
thread.title_full: Heidi Klum's Halloween costume is going to be epic

title: Heidi Klum's Halloween costume is going to be epic
text:
Posted: 8:28 a.m. Sunday, Oct. 4, 2015 Heidi Klum's Halloween costume is going to be epic View Larger Dimitrios Kambouris / Getty Images NEW YORK, NY - SEPTEMBER 10: Heidi Klum visits the INC International Concepts Shop at Macy's Herald Square on September 10, 2015 in New York City. (Photo by Dimitrios Kambouris/Getty Images for Heidi Klum) Related By Cox Media Group National Content Desk 
Pardon the pun, but Heidi Klum has talent. 
She also has a team of people helping her with her Halloween costume this year. 
>> Read more trending stories 
The "America's Got Talent" judge teased her Instagram followers with a preview of her #HeidiHalloween plans. 
It looks like there will be some sort of ceramics or acrylic involved, and apparently it's not just a mask (as shown below). A photo posted by Heidi Klum (@heidiklum) on Oct 2, 2015 at 1:09pm PDT A video posted by Heidi Klum (@heidiklum) on Oct 2, 2015 at 1:20pm PDT A photo posted by Heidi Klum (@heidiklum) on Oct 2, 2015 at 11:18am PDT 
The world-class model posted a more risque video of her costume prep on her Instagram as well.
